name: Arts Faculty Journal
about: The goal of this journal system is to increase the visibility to the participating journals, use and impact of the university's research publications by offering them to use through the university's own online journal system. The journal system consists of fulltext materials produced in the Dhaka University, covering the full range of academic journals of the University.

name: implistic fabrication of aniline and pyrrole-based poly(Ani-co-Py) for efficient photocatalytic performance and supercapacitors
about: Aniline (Ani) and pyrrole (Py) based copolymers (poly(Ani-co-Py)) were fabricated by varying the reaction time ranging from 4 to 8 h through chemical oxidative polymerization technique. The photocatalytic performance and the application as supercapacitors of prepared copolymers were assessed together with the studies of their morphological features.
